html:
** Affirm Holdings AFRM.O shares down ~4% premarket as buy now, pay later (BNPL) firm looks to raise capital

** Co says offering privately $1.25 bln 5-yr convertible notes (Full Story)

** AFRM plans to use net offering proceeds for general corp purposes, fund future growth

** Last week, AFRM said it expanded its partnership with Amazon.com AMZN.O and posted topline beat (Full Story)

** AFRM shares on Weds closed at $151.72 for ~$42.6 bln market cap, per Refinitiv data

** Co went public in Jan in IPO priced at $49/sh


(Lance Tupper is a Reuters market analyst. The views expressed are his own)

(( lance.tupper@thomsonreuters.com
